body: Hi Chris, now I understand your comment: we have not attached the heating thermostat set point to 0 Celsius for all of the heatDesignDay - it seems we have done this, but if you check our file previously attached you will see we have linked the correct schedule for the design day. The schedule with 0 Celsius has been used only for Sunday and holiday. Moreover, if we detach all the schedules, we still obtain the same issues. Let me know your thoughts. Thanks, Riccardo [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/LacygCl0qQKdBQCq5hW0Jel80CY0jqkttuejXLocQ7ViYpQOxOPK4akIdJGxr*WUlqhtoIg*oGHuV23qyQkWGReSts-IXdDv/ff.png)
